attributes.action: continue to allow MPs' expenses to be subject to FOI requests, and for MPS to make an annual declaration of all such expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am concerned that if the forthcoming bar on FOI requests relating to MPs expenses is passed, then members will become objects of scorn and disdain, and are likely to be perceived as living outwith the same standards that apply to people who work in normal businesses.
